entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:28 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:28 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
